Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
The Career Fair is designed to connect you with employers interested in recruiting for internships and entry-level positions and graduate schools interested in students attending their university's programs. 



The Career Fair will be October 9, 2013 from 10am - 3pm at the BYU-I Center.

Companies Attending Fair       Graduate Schools Attending Fair




Resume Café

October 7 & 8
MC 125C

8:30am - 4:00pm

Résumé Café is a resume workshop where students can get their résumé reviewed and receive feedback on how to best represent themselves to employers. Bring a hard-copy resume for a quick review to ensure you're prepared for the fair!

Career Fair

October 9, 2013 | BYU-I Center

10:00am - 3:00pm

A Career, Internship, Graduate School and Job fair that attracts over 100 employers and graduate schools to the BYU-Idaho Center Gym to meet and talk with students.

Check out the list of companies and grad schools attending, preparation tips, and more.

Information Sessions and Interview Schedules

Many companies and graduate schools have scheduled additional presentations on campus during Career Week.

Click here to see the schedules:

  • Interview Schedules
